name: Anime Crimes Division Season 2
summary: Detectives Joe Fuyara and Diesel are back for a second season, working to solve a series of anime-inspired crimes taking place in Neo Otaku City. In order to do so, Joe and Diesel must defeat TOXIC: a terrorist group from nearby Prestige TV City who want to steal all the anime from Neo Otaku City because they don’t believe anyone else is worthy. Joe and Diesel battle these evil terrorists in order to restore order to Neo Otaku City, and ensure anime is still something for everyone to enjoy.

eps.name: The Case Promised In Our Early Days
eps.desc: Diesel's been demoted to Tape Squad, but opportunity strikes when ex-detective Joe ends up being the lone lead in a new anime murder case. Can Diesel convince her old partner to don his badge again and return to a world of anime he's grown to hate? And is there something much more sinister behind this anime murder than originally meets the eye?

eps.name: ACD_AMV.wmv
eps.desc: Joe's back to avenge his friend and knows exactly where to go first: AMV Alley. There, he has a run-in with his past, as well as an old friend. But, when two comrades are murdered right in front of him, Joe's morale is put into question once more. With mortal danger Naruto-running close behind, can Joe rediscover his Ninja Way? And will Diesel find the next victims before they meet the same fate? Find out next time on ACD...

eps.name: Silence of the Fireflies
eps.desc: Alone once again, Diesel's only hope of finding the next victims requires her to confront the akuma of her past. Meanwhile, Joe, attempting to escape the flawed world of Neo Otaku City, finds himself trapped in an online game of life or death. Will our heroes be able to come to terms with their pasts in time to save the present? Find out next time on Anime Crimes Division...

eps.name: The Beach Episode
eps.desc: The beach episode is here, and the forecast is calling for forced sexual tension and increased merchandising sales. Much to our heroes' dismay, however, it's not all sunshine and fake tans in Prestige TV City. A festering darkness lies beneath its shiny smile. Can our favorite detectives uncover this city's shocking truth? And will they or won't they finally confess their non-existent feelings? Find out next time on Anime Crimes Division...

eps.name: Blood: The Last Hard Drive
eps.desc: TOXIC has completed their takeover of Neo Otaku City, and with Joe captured, Diesel is the city's only hope. Can she find a way to destroy the limiter before time runs out? Will Joe survive the binge? And is Pikachu actually fireproof? Find out next time on Anime Crimes Division...

eps.name: The Saddest Anime Death of All Time
eps.desc: With the limiter still intact and all hope seemingly lost, Diesel's only chance of saving anime is to help a brainwashed Joe rediscover his undying love for Japanese animation. But will she be able to help him go even further beyond, or will Joe succumb to his hatred and bury her along with his past? Find out this time on Anime Crimes Division...
